trigger_description: This trigger fires when you press the button on your Tracker.

trigger: When significant journey alert is triggered
trigger_description: This trigger fires when a significant journey is detected.

trigger: When low battery alert is triggered
trigger_description: This trigger fires when the battery reaches 20%, and then again when 5% remains.
This trigger fires when a zone alert is triggered.

trigger: When new location data is available
trigger_description: This trigger fires every time location data is sent by your Tracker.
This trigger fires when anti-theft alert is activated.
